info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 11:01AM EDT until August 31 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following county, Pinellas.
* WHEN...Until 100 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1101 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clearwater, Largo, Ridgecrest, Harbor Bluffs, Belleair and Belleair Bluffs. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON
